```{r Test Data}
dataframe <- iris
```

```{r Import methods}
#Read from file in same directory
#<name of df> <- read_excel(here("file name.xlsx"), sheet = "Sheet name", range = "A1:E33")

```

```{r Basic normalisation}
#create copy of object
dataframe1 <- dataframe
#automatic name changes
dataframe1 <- dataframe1 %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r subsetting types}
dataframe1 <- dataframe
# keep only some columns by number
dataframe1 <- dataframe1[c(1,2,3,4)]
# remove rows by number
dataframe1 <- dataframe1[,-c(6,7)]
```
